client

Class communicator

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.communicator

  • public class communicator
extends java.lang.Object
    this is the object responsible for letting the server know what the client wants to do and letting the client know how it went with the server.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      communicator(java.lang.String server, int port)
      starts the communicator class, which can then communicate with a server using communication tokens
